page.title: 07My Day in Holloway (1985)
page.content: At{7.30am}I get up, have a wash and look out of the window to see if it is a sunny day. At{7.45am}I go down stairs to have my breakfast of cereal, toast and jam and a cup of tea. At {8.00am}I get dressed and then feed my rabbit and take the dog for a walk. At{8.30am}I start to walk to school and call for my friend Suzanne on the way. At{9.00am}in school, MR. Mackey calls the register and then we start work. At{10.30am}we have playtime, then we have more lessons. At{12.00 noon we wash our hands and have lunch in the hall. Next we have playtime again. At{1.00pm}we have more lessons until{2.15pm}when we have a break. At {3.30pm}we finish school and by{4.00pm I am home. After school I play with Suzanne till{5.30pm}when I have tea . Until {8.30pm}I watch T.V. then I go to bed.
